ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Back at the People s base, the Radicons were finally realeased from the door, because their time ran out. The Radicons came to the surface after reconfiguring

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Back at the People's base, the Radicons were finally realeased from the
door, because their time ran out. The Radicons came to the surface after
reconfiguring back to 6 bot conversion.

"We have all become friends again, and we are all back to normal!" Train
Wreck said.

"Too cool we are together!" Airbomber said.

"We needed each other, each one of us are special." Arrow said.

"Friends are too valuable to lose." Blender said.

"I need these guys to help me kick ass!" Stronghold said.

"These guys are my best friends, and I never want to seperate from them
again!" Stranato said.

"So we're all friends again!" Plintissa said. Dracona nodded. Artist crossed
his arms.

"No, you guys aren't out friends." Stranato said. Plintissa gasped.
Dracona's eyes widened. Artist coughed. The Radicons opened blazing fire on
The 2 Populists and Artist. Dracona and Plintissa ran for the hills,
grabbing Artist when they ran. Stranato laughed evily. Plintissa typed in
the code for the Radicons and pushed the enemy button on her remote. The
Radicons were fired on by the People's Base. The Radiocns took off into the
jungle, Stranato still laughing.

"You know, I bet all that time they were moving their ship away from the
position they crashed at, that must be their base!" Dracona said. Plintissa
sighed.

"lets go to the Maximal base and tell them the news." Plintissa said.
Plintissa's group really was dead, all it had left was 2 members. Plintissa,
Dracona, and Artist walked back to the Maximal base...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 4:52 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
> * Iron Raptor suddenly heard the bushes suddenly ruffle, the movement in
them causing her to quickly draw her splatter gun...the brush almost seeming
to be alive!
> She then growled and narrowed her optics as she then saw Zardus pop from
out of the bushes with his weapon trained on her, but then thinking that it
was just him that he would be easily beaten.
> She quickly brought her gun up to aim at the Alliance leader's head, then
more rustle produced three other Alliance members and one giant
bot...realizing that she was heavily out numbered.
> Iron Raptor growled as she kept her gun level with Zardus's head but then
wore an expression the simply knew defeat, however, her attitude would prove
otherwise. She snarled at his greeting.*
>
> " To bad I can't say the same for you!"
>
> * She listened to his statement for them to go along with them to their
base, a smile developing on her face as she then put her gun away.
> It was a bit hard not to notice the huge rifle aiming at her head but then
simply shook her head, she had far more to do then just be carried off by
the Alliance.
> Iron Raptor put her hands on her hips for a moment before shaking her head
again...giving Tavatron a knowing look to just go along with it.*
>
> " You know I'd love to go back to your place for dinner but I'm a little
to busy right now."
>
> * She then chanced something that a bot would say was crazy but she had no
time to argue with these...bots.
> Iron Raptor walked up to Zardus but then shouldered past him, simply
walking by Predabot but keeping in mind that it wouldn't be nice to be shot
by a giant rifle.
> With more guts then she cared to admit she then looked back over her
shoulder towards the Alliance leader.*
>
> " Maybe some other time. Come on Tav, time's a wastin."
>
> * With that she then turned her head towards the direction of the Ark and
kept walking, if she could just get herself and Tavatron a few more feet
from the Alliance then they could make a run for it. If not...then damage
was clearly seen in the future!*
>
>
